trans-unit.source: An instance of this type is returned by the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.GetContacts*> static method.
trans-unit.target: Un'istanza di questo tipo viene restituita dal <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.GetContacts*>metodo statico.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.GetContacts*>

trans-unit.source: This collection holds instances of the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> element, which specifies information about a peer within a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager>.
trans-unit.target: Questa raccolta contiene le istanze dell' <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>elemento, che consente di specificare le informazioni su un peer all'interno di un <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>

trans-unit.source: No public constructors are defined for this class.
trans-unit.target: Nessun costruttore pubblico definito per questa classe.

trans-unit.source: Inserts a new <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> element into the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContactCollection"></xref> at the specified index or key.
trans-unit.target: Inserisce un nuovo <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> elemento nel <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContactCollection"> </xref> all'indice specificato o alla chiave.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the element to replace
trans-unit.target: L'indice in base zero dell'elemento da sostituire

trans-unit.source: The new value for the element at the specified index
trans-unit.target: Il nuovo valore per l'elemento in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> provided is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> fornito è<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Replaces the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Sostituisce il <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the element to replace.
trans-unit.target: Indice in base zero dell'elemento da sostituire.

trans-unit.source: The new value for the element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Il nuovo valore per l'elemento in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> provided is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> fornito è<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Returns a Unicode <xref:System.String> representing the current value of each <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref>, separated by commas.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un Unicode <xref:System.String>che rappresenta il valore corrente di ogni <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref>, separati da virgole.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Unicode <xref:System.String> representing the current value of each <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref>, separated by commas.
trans-unit.target: Unicode <xref:System.String>che rappresenta il valore corrente di ogni <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref>, separati da virgole.</xref:System.String>
